愛子李堉睿裸體大鬧IKEA　李興文隱沒多日後說話了
04 Nov 2019, 03:25 by 娛樂組
資深演員李興文之子李堉睿日前深夜大鬧知名傢俱賣場「IKEA」新莊店，還裸體直播，遭警方以妨害風化、無故侵入他們建築物查辦。今（4日）稍早沉默多日的李興文終於出面向社會大眾以及受害賣場道歉，並對自己教子無方感到慚愧！
李堉睿繼去年直播「吸麻無害」後，日前也闖之名傢俱賣場還裸體直播再度引起熱議。但李堉睿闖禍至今，身為父親的李興文遲遲都未對外說明，也引起不少網友撻伐。稍早李興文終於在個人臉書上貼文向社會大眾致歉，除了自責教導無方，他也對於有媒體報導兒子會做出如此荒唐行徑，肇因於他鐵血教育下所造成的反叛作出澄清。
李興文強調對孩子的教育是因材施教，並非媒體報導是鐵的紀律、嚴酷無情，自認當年送小孩出國唸書，就是認為美國教育的開放與幽默，不同於台灣的善良保守。誰知道因為兩地教育文化的不同，自己又疏於管教才導致兒子偏差行為一再發生，並強調自己「責無旁貸」。


李興文自認仍無法了解兒子李堉睿為何會有如此荒唐行徑。（翻攝自李堉睿IG）

但也因為李堉睿已25歲，早是個成年人了，李興文坦言「我尊重他選擇的生活方式，但是我目前還無法理解他荒謬的行為。」如今李興文自認與老婆再也無法管教孩子的脫序行為，「骨肉雖親，大道為重，那就交給法律去教育他！」對於社會大眾不諒解他遲遲未出面為子道歉，李興文澄清表示「不會為他出面，是因為他是成年人了，必須要為自己所做的事情負責任。」
更新時間｜2019.11.04 03:23

Aiko Li Ruirui is naked and IKEA Li Xingwen has not talked for many days.
04 Nov 2019, 03:25 by Entertainment Group
Li Xingru, the son of senior actor Li Xingwen, recently screamed at the famous furniture store "IKEA" Xinzhuang Store in the middle of the night. It was also broadcast live naked, and was invaded by the police to invade their buildings. Li Xingwen, who was silent for a few days earlier today (4th), finally apologized to the public and the victim store, and felt embarrassed about his own teachings!
After Li Weirui’s live broadcast of “Natural and Innocent” last year, the name of the furniture store was also naked. However, Li Yirui has been plagued by this. Li Xingwen, who is a father, has not explained it to the outside world, and has caused many netizens to slash. Earlier, Li Xingwen finally apologized to the public on his personal Facebook. In addition to self-blame and teaching, he also made such ridiculous behaviors for the media to report his son, citing the rebellion caused by his iron-blooded education.
Li Xingwen emphasized that the education of children is to teach students in accordance with their aptitude. It is not that media reports are iron disciplines and ruthlessness. They believe that sending children to study abroad in the past is to think that the openness and humor of American education is different from the goodness and conservativeness of Taiwan. Who knows that because of the differences in education and culture between the two places, they are neglecting to discipline themselves, causing their sons to deviate repeatedly, and stressing that they are "responsible."


Li Xingwen believes that he still cannot understand why his son Li Ruirui has such a ridiculous act. (Reviewed from Li Ruirui IG)

But because Li Ruirui is 25 years old and he was an adult, Li Xingwen said frankly, "I respect the lifestyle he chose, but I still can't understand his absurd behavior." Li Xingwen now recognizes that his wife can no longer discipline the children. Behavior, "If the flesh and blood are pro, the avenue is heavy, then give the law to educate him!" For the public, he did not understand that he had not come forward to apologize for the child. Li Xingwen clarified that "I will not appear for him because he is an adult. You must be responsible for what you do."
